name: Everest Base Camp Trek
overview: The classic trek to the base of the world's highest mountain, offering stunning Himalayan views and Sherpa culture.
how_to_get_there: Fly to Lukla from Kathmandu, then trek north to Namche Bazaar and onward to EBC.
what_to_see: Khumbu Icefall, Kala Patthar, Tengboche Monastery.

name: Annapurna Circuit Trek
overview: A varied trek through diverse landscapes, from subtropical valleys to high mountain passes.
how_to_get_there: Drive or fly to Pokhara, then take local transport to the trailhead.
what_to_see: Thorong La Pass, Muktinath, terraced hills.

name: Phewa Lake, Pokhara
overview: A serene lake with mountain reflections and boating â€” gateway to many adventure activities.
how_to_get_there: Drive from Pokhara city center or taxi from Pokhara airport.
what_to_see: Tal Barahi temple, lakeside cafes, mountain views.

name: Boudhanath Stupa
overview: One of the largest spherical stupas in Nepal and an important pilgrimage site for Buddhists.
how_to_get_there: A short drive from central Kathmandu.
what_to_see: Prayer wheels, rooftop cafes, Tibetan monasteries.

name: Chitwan National Park
overview: A UNESCO World Heritage site famous for one-horned rhinoceros and Bengal tigers.
how_to_get_there: Drive from Kathmandu or fly to Bharatpur airport.
what_to_see: Jungle safaris, canoe trips, Tharu culture.

name: Lumbini
overview: Birthplace of Lord Buddha and an important pilgrimage and archaeological site.
how_to_get_there: Drive from Bhairahawa or take a local bus.
what_to_see: Maya Devi Temple, monasteries from around the world.

name: Paragliding in Pokhara
overview: World-class paragliding with panoramic views of Phewa Lake and the Annapurna range.
how_to_get_there: Book with a licensed operator in Pokhara; short drive to takeoff site.
what_to_see: Aerial views of the valley and mountains.

name: Manaslu Circuit Trek
overview: A remote, less-crowded Himalayan trek circling Mount Manaslu.
how_to_get_there: Drive from Kathmandu to Soti Khola and start trek.

name: Nagarkot Sunrise View
overview: Famous viewpoint for Himalayan sunrise and panoramic mountain vistas.
how_to_get_there: Drive from Kathmandu to Nagarkot; short hikes available.
what_to_see: Sunrise over the Himalaya, mountain panoramas.
